scripts.dev: npm run generate && npm run rungame
scripts.dev:noclip: npm run generate && npm run rungame:noclip
scripts.prod: export mode="production" && npm run generate && npm run rungame
scripts.release:normal: export variant="normal" && export outputDir="./output" && export mode="production" && rm-rf cache && npm run generate
scripts.release:premium: export variant="premium" && export outputDir="./output" && export mode="production" && rm -rf cache && npm run generate
